value.0: *The caretaker seems busy taking care.*
Hello there, what can I do for you?
Thank you for your services, my friend!
Excellent! Here, a little reward for your help...
Hurray! Now I can bake some more of my famous special apple cakes!
Excellent work! I need those for my potions.

Certainly, you can go deliver a few things for me while you're about. 

I have a package of herbs here for Sister Hannah in the Salandran Temple. She needs it quickly, so visit her first. You can reach the temple by the ferry just outside the Shrine. Here's a bit of money for the trip. 

This batch of eggs goes to Feram,Bemmi the Baker's new helper. You can take the hidden road through the trees and go south towards the Forest. Continue southeards and you will reach Bendir Dale. You'll find Feram in the orchard with the farmer. Stay on the roads and you will be safe!
Oh, you brought my sword hilt! Don't you just love the colouring?
Ahh... good <man/woman>! Give me the order note and I will have a look in my wares.
You certainly can. I have something I need picked up from Nexus Falls, near the Elven settlement of Winya.

Visit Semlion the trader, he's somewhere around the cart and ferry station. Pick up the item I've ordered from him. Here's the order form. He'll need to see it to know what you're there for... 

The safest way to reach him is by the ferry leaving from Kampo's Trading Post, just north of the Shrine.

Of course you can! I need someone to clean up our idol of Eilistraee to keep it in good shape. So, go and fetch the bucket of water at the other side of the pool. There's a pump over there, and buckets.
No! There's a few little shrubs over towards the woods on the Western side of the shrine. Pull them gently and use the roots with the water and clean the idol, because they clean well just like soap.
Nevermind, farewell.
Hello there!
Most welcome!
I delivered you packages, Elrienia
Thank you!
I have this box of eggs for you...
<StartAction>leave</Start>
<StartAction>give him the eggs</Start>
I was told to bring you these herbs, m'lady.
I think I will keep them, actually. Bye bye.
Here they are, m'lady.
Can you help me find my way around the country side a bit?
That seems easy. I am on it!
Here's your package, Elrienia .
Very nice! I will keep it myself.
Yes, it's nice! Here you are!
Elrienia sent me to collect a package, Sir.
Order...? Note...? Huh?
Here you are, Sir!
Can I run some errands for you?
Actually no thanks, farewell.
Alright, I'm interested!
That seems easy. I am on it!
Can I take care of some chores around here for you?
I see... I guess I throw the water over the idol?
That seems easy. I am on it!
